description: The eighth edition of International Management: Culture, Strategy, and Behavior incorporates important new and emerging developments affecting international managers. The text is designed to help students understand how to effectively adjust, adapt, and navigate the changing business landscape they will face on a day-to-day basic. Luthans and Doh continue to take a balanced approach to the theory of international management while also making the book even more user-friendly and practical.
title: International Management: Culture, Strategy, and Behavior
